record.field:
Please collect and detail all essential information required for a site assessment or installation planning, specifically including, but not limited to:

  • Spatial Documentation: Comprehensive floor plans detailing the available space (dimensions, layout, height, fixed installations, etc.).
  • Electrical Infrastructure: Full specifications of the electrical system (outlet locations, panel capacity, circuitry, voltage requirements, wiring diagrams, switch placement, and compliance with codes).
  • Floor Specifications: Details on the installation floor (material, load-bearing capacity, presence of raised access floors, suitability for cable routing, and depth for in-floor utilities).
  • Additional Site Constraints: Any other pertinent technical or environmental factors ("etc.") that may impact the design or installation (e.g., HVAC system, plumbing, network infrastructure, access points, and seismic considerations).
